Posts.Content: Jul 5, 2009 08:24PM bjpuppy wrote: It's so good to know that I'm not going crazy.  I don't know if you still check this, I know it's an old post, but do you or did you ever get blurred vision on Abraxane/Avastin?  I signed up for this message board because it seemed like many people were very knowledgeable about this treatment.  I am on A/A for metastatic melanoma in my left lung.  Thanks for listening. Marni
Posts.Title: Abraxane and Avastin combo weekly b445 mgk63

Posts.Content: Aug 3, 2009 08:38PM bjpuppy wrote: Thank you so much for replying to my question.  I went to the opthomalogist and he said it's severe dry eye due to the chemo and put me on restasis. I'm having major nail problems too but my onc doesn't want me to see a podiatrist until I see him first.  In the meantime I'm using anti fungal medicine (otc) in hopes of preventing what may be inevitable (nail loss).  I'm a teacher and heading back to work next week.  I hope I can keep up the pace. Thanks again for being there.  It helps to know I'm not alone.
